sqlMap.select:
SELECT FROM MER_TRANS WHERE 1=1 AND MER_TRANS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(TRANS_KEY) Like '%'||(#trans_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PUBLIC_KEY) Like '%'||(#public_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PRIVATE_KEY) Like '%'||(#private_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RULES) Like '%'||(#rules:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_TRANS_AMT) Like '%'||(#lowest_trans_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#terminal_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bus_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACTION_LIST) Like '%'||(#action_list:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTO_APPROVE) Like '%'||(#auto_approve:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTH_STATUS) Like '%'||(#auth_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_STATUS) Like '%'||(#t0_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TYPE) Like '%'||(#clear_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TRACT) Like '%'||(#clear_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_NOTIFY_STATUS) Like '%'||(#trans_notify_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_NOTIFY_URL) Like '%'||(#trans_notify_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_NOTIFY_ACTION_LIST) Like '%'||(#trans_notify_action_list:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_RATE) Like '%'||(#basic_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_RATE2) Like '%'||(#basic_rate2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#basic_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#basic_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#basic_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BAISC_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#baisc_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_TERMINAL_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#basic_terminal_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_REGION) Like '%'||(#basic_region:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_MCC) Like '%'||(#basic_mcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#mer_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TSN) Like '%'||(#mer_tsn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RATE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#rate_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(IS_REPORT) =#is_report#
(IS_APP_TRANS_TERMINAL) Like '%'||(#is_app_trans_terminal:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_RATE) Like '%'||(#t0_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_TRANS WHERE 1=1 AND MER_TRANS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(TRANS_KEY) Like '%'||(#trans_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PUBLIC_KEY) Like '%'||(#public_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PRIVATE_KEY) Like '%'||(#private_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RULES) Like '%'||(#rules:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_TRANS_AMT) Like '%'||(#lowest_trans_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#terminal_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bus_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACTION_LIST) Like '%'||(#action_list:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTO_APPROVE) Like '%'||(#auto_approve:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AUTH_STATUS) Like '%'||(#auth_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_STATUS) Like '%'||(#t0_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TYPE) Like '%'||(#clear_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_TRACT) Like '%'||(#clear_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_NOTIFY_STATUS) Like '%'||(#trans_notify_status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_NOTIFY_URL) Like '%'||(#trans_notify_url:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_NOTIFY_ACTION_LIST) Like '%'||(#trans_notify_action_list:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_RATE) Like '%'||(#basic_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_RATE2) Like '%'||(#basic_rate2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#basic_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#basic_per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#basic_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BAISC_CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#baisc_card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_TERMINAL_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#basic_terminal_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_REGION) Like '%'||(#basic_region:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BASIC_MCC) Like '%'||(#basic_mcc:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#mer_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#mer_lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#mer_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_TSN) Like '%'||(#mer_tsn:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RATE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#rate_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(IS_REPORT) =#is_report#
(IS_APP_TRANS_TERMINAL) Like '%'||(#is_app_trans_terminal:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(T0_RATE) Like '%'||(#t0_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
